title: Bella Hadid flashes midriff as she goes topless beneath slim jacket while out and about in Chelsea
text:
Her street style is the stuff of headlines.

And Bella Hadid lived up to her reputation this Wednesday in New York, flashing her midriff while going topless beneath a red slim jacket.

The 23-year-old kept her top few buttons closed but left the bottom ones undone, slipping into a pair of nude pinstripe trousers.

On the go: Bella Hadid lived up to her reputation this Wednesday in New York, flashing her midriff while going topless beneath a red slim jacket

Throwing a Chanel anorak over one arm, the younger sister of fellow supermodel Gigi Hadid wore a knit beanie for her outing.

Bella enjoyed a ritzy birthday brunch last week at Sadelle's in SoHo with Gigi, their brother Anwar and their mother Yolanda Hadid.

Anwar has lately been running around with New Rules pop act Dua Lipa, who was also part of the guest list at the elegant New York affair.

Glowing: The 23-year-old kept her top few buttons closed but left the bottom ones undone, slipping into a pair of nude pinstripe trousers

Legging it: Throwing a Chanel anorak over one arm, the younger sister of fellow supermodel Gigi Hadid wore a knit beanie for her outing

Last month, Gigi and Bella traveled to Rotterdam with Yolanda for the funeral of the latter's mother, Ans Van Den Herik, who died at 78 after suffering from cancer.

Gigi's Bachelorette beau Tyler Cameron was glimpsed at her side during the funeral, but there are rumors now that it is over.

Meanwhile, Bella recently went through another split from her on-off boyfriend The Weekend, whose real name is Abel Tesfaye.

Living it up: Bella enjoyed a ritzy birthday brunch last week at Sadelle's in SoHo with Gigi, their brother Anwar and their mother Yolanda Hadid

'They are in different places right now, physically and mentally,' an insider gossiped to E! News at the beginning of this August.

'Bella is prepping for her fashion week commitments and Abel is working on his music and his upcoming acting debut.'

The Weeknd is playing himself in Uncut Gems, the new Adam Sandler vehicle from acclaimed Good Time directors Josh and Benny Safdie.
description: Her street style is the stuff of headlines. And Bella Hadid lived up to her reputation this Wednesday in New York, flashing her midriff while going topless beneath a red slim jacket.
